[S3.1] S3 general purpose buckets should have block public access settings enabled

This control checks whether S3 buckets have bucket-level public access blocks applied. The control fails if any of the public access block settings are set to false.

[S3.2] S3 general purpose buckets should block public read access

This control checks whether S3 buckets allow public read access by evaluating the bucket policy and the bucket ACL.

[EC2.1] Amazon EBS snapshots should not be publicly restorable

This control checks whether Amazon EBS snapshots are publicly restorable. EBS snapshots should not be publicly accessible unless you explicitly want to share the data.
